title: BTS Reaction 5: Mafia AU (KSJ Version)
body:
Disclaimer: This is a post of fiction and not real. This is for entertainment purposes only, no harm is intended to be aimed at those involved. 

Warnings: Mentions of a dead body, bad injuries and violence in a relationship. 

Posted: 25th April 2019

MASTERLIST 

When they took you away nobody knew what was happening, why they were taking you and potentially what you did. One key thing that people noted was how calm you were. Of course, you would be calm, you knew what was going on; everything you’ve built since you were born is crumbling around you. 

When they took you away Jin was distraught. To him, you were an accountant, who worked hard and earned a ridiculous amount. You bought houses and invested in them, you travelled abroad a lot with your clients. He never questioned you once. You never gave him a reason to; he trusted you. 

When they took you away your husband had been dead for 9 days. His neighbours started to detect a foul smell, so they alerted the authorities; to which they were shocked when your ‘respectable’ husband was found dead, face down on the floor; his throat cut deep. You stupidly left your fingerprints all over the scene; a rookie mistake for someone of your crime stature. It didn’t take them long to put two and two together. That two and two is one of the biggest gangsters in the East was killed so easily, and you’re the only one the evidence points to. Your presence in the crime ‘community’ was everywhere, one of the top female gangsters of the modern day- The Cocaine Godmother couldn’t hold a flame to you. 

When they took you away, it was a media frenzy. Kim Seokjins’ girlfriend of 6 years is found guilty of murdering her husband of 16 years (you two were married off young, as a way to bridge the wealthiest families together. No love). Getting with Jin was never planned, he just stumbled into one of your many clubs and he fell for you. Your beauty captivated him even in his drunken state.  You two quickly got together, your husband actually encouraged it; you were able to strengthen your presence in both the regular world and the crime world. Being of high presence in both allowed you to keep your authority strong within the criminal underworld without actually having to commit anything.  Being so active in the media allowed you to build up a godly profile for yourself; charitable work, volunteering, donations, anything to give you a good reputation you did. Connections were also made easy for you, you could bribe and manipulate your way out of anything. 

When they took you away you were not surprised at all, there had been growing issues and tension within your group, and the crime world anyway, thus leading to intense arguments with your husband. You don’t scare easy, but my god this man truly terrified you. Whenever you told Jin about your trips overseas, all they were were hospital trips, trying to conceal broken ribs, cuts and bruises became routine for you. Not that this excuses you being a murderer. This time around, you just lost your own temper, as he was accusing you of selling your own weapons to some smaller group; you’re not stupid so you did no such thing. The screaming match lasted for hours, including mean threats of death. He didn’t have time to act on his. You screamed “I’ll cut your vocal cords out’ or something along those lines. And that you did, well, you cut his throat. Making sure he was dead, you cleaned yourself up, and left his apartment. Making your way back to Jin’s warm embrace. 

When they took you away 3 years ago, Jin was distraught, and in denial. He never could ever see you as the criminal that you were. He isolated himself away from his friends, family and company, only focusing his attention on your trial. He lost a lot of weight from the stress of everything, causing people to be concerned. After your life sentence was announced, he himself was called into his companies office. They wanted to end his contract there and then and force him to enlist. Again, he was distraught: he’s lost the love of his life and his second family. The six bandmates just sat there looking down, not saying a word, silently crying. No one expected a scandal of this magnitude to hit them out of the blue. After very strong words between him and the company, they agreed he would be allowed to stay in the band but to enlist; as a kind of hiatus. The fans hated it but hated you more. You corrupted Jin and ruined his image. In their eyes, you deserved everything you got. This mindset also was matched by the rest of society. 

His enlistment ended, and the first thing he wanted to do was see you. People advised him it was a bad idea but so was getting involved with you. 

—-

“Y/N, you’ve got a visitor. First one in three years, and you said you were popular” your prison officer essentially yelled into your cell. You’ve remained silent for over half of your sentence. Your power still resonates even within the prison, not that you rarely take advantage of it but you don’t need to when people are terrified of you

“Maybe she’ll speak today I heard who’s coming. He’s going to want answers” she laughs to her colleague

“if it’s Jin I don’t want to see him” you croak out

“Ooo so she does speak, and I was here thinking it was him who cut her vocal cords out” 

“I’m not going”

“You have to, you are only allowed three visitors in your entire sentence, so id takes your first one with open arms” you were forcefully removed from your cell and transported to the visiting wing. Due to your visitors’ stature and yours, a private room was given. You took your seat at the table, the chair shrieking as you slowly pull it out and place yourself onto it. Voices echo from the other side of one of the doors. You know its Jin and Jeongguk. Those two always had a good friendship, you admired that

“I told you, if it was Jin I’m not doing this, let me leave please” you almost shout, standing up quickly, the chair falling back. You walk to the door you came from and start kicking it, the chains around your wrists and ankles clang with each movement

“Y/N please sit back down, you have one hour” a voice from the intercom alerts you. It was so loud you very nearly didn’t hear the door behind you opening, and two male voices whispering

“Prisoner 10219 please take your seat” a prison guard standing behind your door tells you. The stairs at the table squeak again before the room falls into a deafening silence 

“Y/N, we need to talk,” Jeongguk tells you

“You don’t need to be here eh? Neither of you do” You spit out. Your back still facing them 

“Well we’re both here now, so just accept it” Jeongguk is obviously trying to intimidate you

“Jeongguk, if you’re trying to intimidate her, just stop” Jin’s voice causes you to suck in a sharp breath 

“I really loved you, you know? There’s just so much” slowly turning around you look at your boyfriend, well ex-boyfriend

“That isn’t why I’m here, I’m not even sure of that myself, I guess to say goodbye?” 

“Goodbye?”

“yes, goodbye, I have already lost too much, I love you too, but I can’t be associated with you anymore” you don’t know what you expected, but this hurts you. Your romance ending like this. In reality, it ended the moment you were found guilty, that was the catalyst for Jin. He loved you of course but it’s different now. Everything was.
body_abstract:
Disclaimer: This is a post of fiction and not real. This is for entertainment purposes only, no harm is intended to be aimed at those involved. 

Warnings: Mentions of a dead body, bad injuries and violence in a relationship. 

Posted: 25th April 2019

MASTERLIST

do you know bts?

seven boys with all my love

summary:
hi. 
this was a side blog i made strictly for bts content. 
i decided to make a main instead ( @mmmikrokosmos), so follow that...
body:
hi. 

this was a side blog i made strictly for bts content. 

i decided to make a main instead ( @mmmikrokosmos), so follow that if you’re feeling it!

okthanksbye

summary: Boy with Luv surpassed 9 million likes! It's now the fastest mv to do so (13 days) and makes BTS the only act with 4 mvs with...
body: Boy with Luv surpassed 9 million likes! It’s now the fastest mv to do so (13 days) and makes BTS the only act with 4 mvs with more than 9 million likes! (IDOL, DNA, Fake Love) Stream to celebrate. Remember armylegends longetivity is key this comeback 😘

reblog.comment: Boy with Luv surpassed 9 million likes! It’s now the fastest mv to do so (13 days) and makes BTS the only act with 4 mvs with more than 9 million likes! (IDOL, DNA, Fake Love) Stream to celebrate. Remember armylegends longetivity is key this comeback 😘

blog.name: awake-not-today
blog.title: AgustD-estroy me
blog.description: I'm just thirsty for BTS what can I tell you? FIC MASTERLIST

summary:
Taekook Social Media AU
(feat YoonMin and NamJin)
Jungkook is working part time as a nightwatch guard at the local mall to get...
body:
NIGHTWATCH

Taekook Social Media AU

(feat YoonMin and NamJin)

Jungkook is working part time as a nightwatch guard at the local mall to get through college. One night he gets a concerning call in the office from a stranger and takes it upon himself to find out what’s wrong.

Tae is a college student struggling to make friends. He’s lonely and calls the mall just to hear someone else’s voice, not expecting the guy on the other end to actually care.

<< Part 2/?
